news.title: Young campers, teachers and football coach among Texas flood victims
news.summary: At least 91 lives were lost near the Guadalupe River after a deluge on Friday, authorities say.

news.title: CCTV of Manchester airport brawl shown to jury
news.summary: The trial of two brothers accused of attacking police hears of a "high level of violence".

news.title: Released Hamas hostage says Trump can bring home those still captive in Gaza
news.summary: Keith Siegel urged the US president to pressure both Israel and Hamas to agree a new ceasefire and hostage release deal.

news.title: London remembers 7/7 bombings 20 years on as William lays flowers for victims
news.summary: The names of those killed in the bombings 20 years ago have been read to a congregation of families and survivors.

news.title: Russian minister sacked by Putin found dead
news.summary: On Monday morning a presidential decree stated that Starovoit had been dismissed from his post.

news.title: Wimbledon announces change to line call system after 'operator error'
news.summary: Wimbledon makes changes to its electronic line calling system to remove the possibility of 'human error' after controversy on Sunday.

news.title: The Salt Path author defends herself against claims she misled readers
news.summary: Writer Raynor Winn denies allegations that some elements of her best-selling book misled readers.

news.title: Man in court charged with murder of scientist in Dundee
news.summary: The 39-year-old was fatally injured in a street in the Lochee area of the city on Saturday afternoon

news.title: British teen jailed in Dubai over sex with girl returns to UK after Eid pardon
news.summary: The Londoner was jailed in December for a sexual relationship with a 17-year-old British girl.

news.title: What early warnings did flood-hit Texas receive?
news.summary: Questions have been raised about why people were not evacuated before the deluge.
